location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: A family calendar for the month of December, 1955. The top of the calendar is a black and white copy photograph of a woman seated, with her hands resting on a book. Behind her stands a man with his hand resting on her shoulder. The woman is Mrs. Mary Adams Jones; she is the paternal grandmother of Mary Mitchell. The man standing behind Mary Adams Jones has been identified as either Will or Sam Adams (her brothers). Mary Adams Jones was likely educated at a church school. Mary Mitchell notes that Mary Adams Jones did not work outside of the home, and that she was always there after school cooking.

titleInfo.title: Generations - African American Women's Early Activism in Tennessee
